item.title: Singapore Survey 2015: Hard Choices

item.content:encoded:
The animation videos are showing as part of Singapore Survey 2015: Hard Choices. Please feel free to come by anytime until 12 Sep (Sat).

Date: 5 Aug – 12 Sep, (Tue to Sat, 12 – 7pm)
Place: Helutrans Artspace, Tanjong Pagar Distripark (39 Keppel Road, Singapore)

The animations are part of the project Singapore Snaps, created using images from the archive of 15,239 printed photographs collected from the public and scanned from May to July 2014 in Singapore.

Open Tuesdays to Saturdays, 12 – 7pm
Closed on Sundays and Mondays
